summary: This document is an email correspondence from Richard Kahn regarding an extension for transferring assets from an account. Kahn expresses gratitude for assistance and mentions difficulties in contacting the relevant parties.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is seeking assistance with transferring assets from an account and has been granted an extension until May 15th.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn was granted an extension until May 15th for transferring assets from an account.
Kahn has been trying to contact the relevant parties for three days without a response.
The email correspondence indicates a need for assistance in the account transfer process.
